name: @TMX_PLUGIN_NAME@
description: Plugin used to send out Location Messages using data from GPSD

messageTypes.description: Location information gathered from the GPS

configuration.description: Host where the GPSd is running
Route the raw NMEA strings from GPSd through TMX
Speed, in mph, at which the vehicle should be considered stopped, latching the previous position and heading.  Set to 0 to disable latching.
The number of worker threads
Nominal time between GNSS measurements for a u-Blox device, in milliseconds.
Dynamic platform model for a u-Blox device. Common values are 0=Portable, 2=Stationary, 3=Pedestrian, 4=Automotive, 5=Sea
NMEA protocl version to use for a u-Blox device. Common values are 21=2.1, 23=2.3, 40=4.0, 41=4.1, 42=4.2
Enable high precision mode for a u-Blox device.
Time system to which measurements are aligned for a u-Blox device. Common values are 0=UTC time, 1=GPS time, 2=GLONASS time
The baud rate that should be configured on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if UBX should be an input protocol on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if NMEA should be an input protocol on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if RTCM3X should be an input protocol on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if UBX should be an output protocol on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if NMEA should be an output protocol on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if RTCM3X should be an output protocol on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if UBX should be an input protocol on the USB interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if NMEA should be an input protocol on the USB interface for a u-Blox devicea
Flag to indicate if RTCM3X should be an input protocol on the USB interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if UBX should be an output protocol on the USB interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if NMEA should be an output protocol on the USB interface for a u-Blox device
Flag to indicate if RTCM3X should be an output protocol on the USB interface for a u-Blox device
Output rate of the navigation position-time-velocity message on the USB interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the navigation survey-in data message on the USB interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1005 message on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1074 message on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1084 message on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1094 message on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1124 message on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1230 message on the UART1 interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1005 message on the USB interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1074 message on the USB interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1084 message on the USB interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1094 message on the USB interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1124 message on the USB interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Output rate of the RTCM3 type 1230 message on the USB interface for a u-Blox device, per second, per epoch
Time mode receiver mode for a u-Blox device. Common values are 0=Disabled, 1=Survey in, 2=Fixed mode
Determines whether the antenna reference point (ARP) position is given in ECEF or LAT/LON/HEIGHT for a u-Blox device. Common values are 0=ECEF, 1=LLH
Latitude of the ARP position for a u-Blox device, in 1e-7 degrees
Longitude of the ARP position for a u-Blox device, in 1e-7 degrees
Height of the ARP position for a u-Blox device, in cm
